thread.section_title: Chelsea’s league form will help them win FA Cup, says Arsenal legend Martin Keown – Metro
thread.title: Chelsea’s league form will help them win FA Cup, says Arsenal legend Martin Keown
thread.title_full: Chelsea’s league form will help them win FA Cup, says Arsenal legend Martin Keown

author: markbrus88
title: Chelsea’s league form will help them win FA Cup, says Arsenal legend Martin Keown
text:
Antonio Conte has been tipped to lead Chelsea to the double (Picture: Getty) Chelsea ‘s form in the Premier League makes them the favourites to make it a double and win the FA Cup as well this season, according to Arsenal legend Martin Keown.
Arsenal legend reveals the frustrating reason Gunners ALWAYS flop in Europe The Blues are running away with the title at the moment, and enjoy a ten-point lead at the top of the Premier League table as well as making it into the FA Cup semis.
Although Keown can see Tottenham being a difficult opponent for Chelsea in their game at Wembley, the former Gunners defender believes Antonio Conte’s side will ride off the momentum they’ve found in the league.
Chelsea beat Manchester United to reach the semi-finals (Picture: Getty) Conte has made a superb start in English football (Picture: Getty) Keown won two doubles with Arsenal during his playing days and admits that doing well in one competition gives you the drive to go on and win the other as well.
FA Cup semi-finals Arsenal v Manchester City Chelsea v Tottenham 
‘After watching them in the Champions League this season you would say the (FA Cup) winner will not come from Arsenal or Manchester City,’ Keown told the Daily Mail .
‘Neither team offers a balance and you could have been talking about Arsenal the way City failed to defend their lead last night.
‘People can point to Tottenham’s poor record at Wembley but they will only get better for the experience of playing there regularly. We had a bad experience playing there with Arsenal in the Champions League but it made the ground feel far more familiar when it came to playing there for England.
More: Football Chelsea on red alert as Koeman admits Everton could be forced to sell huge star 
Manchester United exile earns England recall along with Jermain Defoe 
Ronald Koeman fires warning to Romelu Lukaku amid Chelsea transfer links 
‘Tottenham are the only team who have embarrassed Chelsea this season but it is difficult to look beyond Antonio Conte’s side.
‘I won two doubles with Arsenal and there is a snowball effect with your league form and the FA Cup. You feel invincible.’
MORE: John Terry dedicates Instagram post to N’Golo Kante 
MORE: Everton resigned to losing Romelu Lukaku to Chelsea
